body:
I'm sorry, I don't understand what bug you are reporting.  The code snippet you show does compile for me (https://play.golang.org/p/qDYvQIUugr).  Are you saying that it should not compile?

Your comment on the second line suggests that you think that `2` should have floating point type.  Why?  An unadored `2` has type `int`.  The use of the shift operator does not change that.
